paragraphs.source:
https://github.com/ArtifexSoftware/ghostpdl-downloads/releases
 Repackaged, excluding non-DFSG files and convenience code copies:
  * non-DFSG fonts
  * PCL and PX3 files without license
  * XPS document with embedded potentially non-DFSG odttf font
  * embedded code copies cluttering authorship/licensing tracking
    (Arguably custom build of jpeg code is required - see bug#582521)

  only GPL Ghostscript,
  whereas the file pcl/LICENSE contains above statement.

paragraphs.comment:
The referenced file LICENSE.txt does not exist
 in folders belonging to same code.

  which should have been included with this file. [...]
